_header: Hail Mary Gods Mother full of grace
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary

EDU205.First Lines:
hail mare goddis moder ful of graceþe lord of hewyne ay with
                    þe wythand is…
EDU205.Last Lines:
…And of þi wamme þe fruyt is blyssit I-wyslord Ihesu
                    crist þe kynges sone of blys
EDU205.Editions:
Stevenson,  George. 
             Pieces from the Makculloch and the Gray MSS. together with The Chepman
                and Myllar Prints.
Scottish Text Society
         65. Edinburgh, 1918: 18.
